metadata.topic_title: ISO 22313 Guidance for Business Continuity Management

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate how ISO 22313's guidance on resilience can be adapted to address modern cybersecurity threats like ransomware attacks. Provide examples from the standard and justify your positions using its core concepts.
